name: OTT details
description: Get Streaming details of Movie and TV Shows. We support 150+ Streaming platforms in US and India such as HBO, YouTube, Netflix , Primve Video, Hotstar, Hulu, etc . (use our OTT Providers endpoint to get the full list OTT providers we support) . In additon to streaming info we also provide basic details on any given movie title.

api_methods.name: Params
api_methods.description: Get array of values that can be used as params in Advanced Search .

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: input 'genre' or 'language' to get array of genre or languages that can be used as filter in advanced search .

utterances.utterance: Can you list all the genres available for movies?
What languages can I filter by when searching for TV shows?
I want to know the different genres I can choose from.
Could you provide me with a list of languages supported for streaming?
Show me the available genres for TV shows.
What are the language options for movies?
List all the genres I can filter by.
Can you tell me which languages are available for filtering?
I'm interested in knowing the genres available for selection.
What languages can I choose from when searching for content?
